channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lunar Eclipse During Supermoon Tonight: When and How to See It
item.description: Earth’s shadow will partially cover one of the biggest and brightest full moons this year.

item.title: Manchester City’s Premier League Hearing, Explained
item.description: The world’s richest soccer league accused its champion of years of financial violations. A hearing that began this week could tarnish the club’s accom...

item.title: Instagram makes teen accounts private as pressure mounts on the app to protect children
item.description: Beginning Tuesday, anyone under 18 who signs up for Instagram will be placed into restrictive teen accounts.

item.title: Corey Lewandowski Was Fired in 2016. Why Is He Back at Trump’s Side?
item.description: Donald Trump often finds comfort in Mr. Lewandowski’s feisty instincts and off-color humor. But some Trump aides worry about his penchant for making h...

item.title: JNIM, an Al Qaeda Affiliate, Claims Attacks in Mali’s Capital
item.description: Mali’s armed forces said the assault had targeted a military police school in Bamako. An Islamist group with allegiance to Al Qaeda said it was respon...

item.title: Jeremy Siegel: The Fed should consider deeper rate cuts or risk a recession
item.description: The debate about the upcoming Fed meeting centers around whether it will cut the funds rate by 25 or 50 basis points. But that may not be enough.

item.title: $50 Billion in Aid to Ukraine Stalls Over Legal Questions
item.description: U.S. and European officials are struggling to honor their pledge to use Russian assets to aid Ukraine.

item.title: $50 Billion in Aid to Ukraine Stalls Over Legal Questions
item.description: U.S. and European officials are struggling to honor their pledge to use Russian assets to aid Ukraine.

item.title: Pret A Manger’s sales crossed the $1 billion mark as it continues to expand around the world
item.description: The sandwich and coffee shop chain said £1 in every £4 spent at Pret is now outside the U.K.

item.title: Dominique Pelicot, Husband on Trial for Drugging and Raping Wife, Testifies
item.description: Dominique Pelicot, who is accused of inviting strangers to rape his wife while she was drugged and unconscious, took the stand for the first time.

item.title: Dominique Pelicot, Husband on Trial for Drugging and Raping Wife, Testifies
item.description: Dominique Pelicot, who is accused of inviting strangers to rape his wife while she was drugged and unconscious, took the stand for the first time.

item.title: Larry Ellison predicts rise of the modern surveillance state where ‘citizens will be on their best behavior’
item.description: Ellison believes citizens and police alike will be under constant surveillance of each other.

item.title: Sean Combs, Music Mogul Known as Diddy, Is Indicted on Sex Trafficking and Racketeering Charges
item.description: In charges unsealed a day after his arrest in Manhattan, the music mogul known as Diddy was accused of running a “criminal enterprise” that threatened...

item.title: Von der Leyen Doles Out Top E.U. Jobs
item.description: Ursula von der Leyen named her choices for the European Commission as she navigates a host of challenges, including the rise of nationalist forces.

item.title: A guide to Trump’s World Liberty Financial crypto token: Who can buy it, when it will launch, and how the SEC might react
item.description: The former president announced his new blockchain gambit in a Twitter Spaces on Monday.
